summary: Completed comprehensive testing of homeschool learning portal. Backend APIs working correctly with AI-powered activity generation using GPT-5.1. Frontend pages loading and functioning properly with good UI/UX design. Minor issue with custom dropdown component interaction in activity generator form.

ui_bugs.issue: Custom Select component (shadcn/ui) difficult to interact with programmatically in tests
ui_bugs.note: Functional for users but challenging for automated testing

passed_tests: Activity generation with GPT-5.1 AI working
Home page loads with all elements
Activity Detail page shows complete activity info
Feedback form functional with rating stars
Search and filter functionality in library
